name: INDX - UI Kit/Design System
description:
INDX is a UI/Design system that will help you generate your own personal toolkit based upon easy, 'copy and paste' methods that you can expand and personalize.


INDX includes:

  • Mobile Templates
  • Desktop Templates
  • Responsive Templates
  • Components
  • Varients
  • Device Mockups
  • Social Media Mockups


Please feel free to duplicate and make it your own. However, please don't sell them and claim credit over any of the templates provided.


All photos images are from unsplash.com.

Icons are from Softies Mini-Iconset
